attributes.name: Persistence via Docker Shortcut Modification v100.0.1
attributes.description: An adversary can establish persistence by modifying an existing macOS dock property list in order to execute a malicious application instead of the intended one when invoked.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
event.category : file and event.action : modification and
 file.path : /Users/*/Library/Preferences/com.apple.dock.plist and
 not process.name : (xpcproxy or cfprefsd or plutil or jamf or PlistBuddy or InstallerRemotePluginService)
